segments.text: I'm taking in all the elements of this drawing, and it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: First, there's the sink, just pouring water onto the floor in an unending stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is already in it, and she's totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, I see the children on the left side, involved in their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks terribly unstable, legs splayed out, just about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching way up, completely off balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself or break those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is wet, creating a huge slipping hazard for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost surreal how many things are going wrong simultaneously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for chaos from this single moment is immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small details add up to a very dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the impending accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The quiet domesticity of the scene makes the risks even more stark.
segments.speaker: PAR
